name: K - Auto PDF Exporter nSlicer
description: A Sketch Plugin to auto-export all '[S]' Prefix artboards to a single pdf, no slices needed! by auto creating slices from prefixed Artboards and exporting them.
author: KhY.

commands.description: Auto-export all '[S]' Prefix artboards to PDF, no slices needed!
commands.name: ✂️ Auto-export all '[S]' Prefix Artboards to PDF
